home_info.about_me: I am an Associate Professor in the Department of Economics at the University of Copenhagen. I am a member of the Center for Economic Behavior and Inequality (CEBI), a Research Fellow at CESifo, a Research Fellow at IZA, and a Research Fellow at RFBerlin. I received my B.A. in Economics from Bogazici University in 2003, and my Ph.D. in Economics from University of Maryland, College Park in 2009. I currently serve as an editor at Journal of Health Economics (2025-).
